attributes.title: it tried✨🧚🏽‍♂️💕 but it should never do it again🤩
attributes.review: This app sexually assaulted me and called me multiple racial slurs within just 10 seconds of downloading!!!!! When I wondered why an app that is funded by our great president would ever try to belittle me, a black female, I remember that I am one of his least priorities in the United States and that he panders to white straight cis males only😻🤩🤩 kinda a bummer considering there’s so many more ppl in amerikkka than just them! It’s almost as if this entire administration is racist and sexist (on top of being homophobic, transphobic, and xenophobic❤️)! The only reason I’m giving it one star is bc it really set the bar HIGH for ignorant white ppl across the nation! I mean you have to be loudly and openly racist if you ever wanna top this guy!! If I could impeach it I definitely would!! xoxo💕💕

attributes.title: WOULD NEVER RECOMMEND
attributes.review: This is caused me to develop a severe case of ptsd!!!! It took so very long to download 57 week are you KIDDING ME. I wanted to come on here and support your  president who also rapes little kids and does child trafficking who is also sexist and a racist, but once i got on i got a death threat by the orange balloon trump himself:( It ruined my entire life, i was depressed and sad and miserable and i still am to this day. If i could give it 0 stars i would. Trump also hacked all my social media accounts got my phone number and email and them leaked them, then proceeded to send people to my house and they beat my cats to death, all 15 of them. He burnt down my house, took all my family away, then told me awful stories of how he raped little kids then sold them on the dark web. This app NEED TO BE DELETED!

attributes.title: Unacceptable😪🧚🎇
attributes.review: I downloaded the app interested to see what our beloved non rapist ,non homophobic🏳️‍🌈,racist,sexist🚺president had to say on the app I was very excited to get the app after hearing very good reviews on it when I got the app I was asked for my age which I thought was a little weird but hey 😛who cares😼🙂I then put my age in and got a message for the cheeto puff himself i-i mean the president👺👁👅👁which caught me off guard be he has a beautiful wife👄and a kid 👥I then blocked him bc I could not think of mr. Cheeto as a cheater👀 I then got spammed with messages and calls for a unknown number telling me to 𝑝𝑙𝑒𝑎𝑠𝑒 download the app back and give the app 5 ⭐️or it was gonna be banned then my phone was completely wiped and got hacked into 😭I lost everything in my phone DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE APP ⚠️warning you‼️ anyways bill nye 2020😙

attributes.title: Trashy app it’s the worst!!!!! 💀😤🤮
attributes.review: This is literally the worst app on the planet it’s so bad. It will take all your data your pictures and everything. This app killed my gold fish named Nemo. I showed it to him and he started floating to the top!!!!! 😭😭😭😭.  This legit made my phone slow and it blew up I had to get a new one so beware. The app said if you don’t vote for trump they will come to ur house and hurt and torture you and put you in the basement with Barron and Melania and starve you. I was there and i escaped 😰. They took out my spleen and ate it I’m so traumatized. I have people saying go back to my country from this horrible app and they keep calling me negro and ugly and fat and it’s just so bad. I’m not any of that I’m supper skinny and green I’m from Uranus😔. I don’t recommend this app. Omg there is someone orange in my backyard I-

attributes.title: horrible and never download
attributes.review: i was reading these reviews and was hesitant to download. i ended up doing it anyways and i stanly regrettes it. all the reviews u r seeing r true, every. single. one. 😾i opened the app and saw a 60yo man working out. it was disgusting, like watching an ugly pig trying to life weights. now my phone has a virus and grew wings and flew away.( i am writing this on my apple watch. ) my friend saw the app as well when i opened it and now both of her eyes have scars on them. she is getting better ow but i don’t think she will ever heal fully from that traumatic experience, not sure i will either. and let’s not forget my poor cat. she’s gone now. she was sleeping when i opened it and all the horrible things woke her from her slumber and ran away instantly. please DO NOT download this.😾😾❤️

attributes.title: very disappointed
attributes.review: When I first heard of this app, I was very excited to see more of and be more in touch with my favorite cult lead—sorry, favorite president. Unfortunately, despite being brainwashed to the point of leaving no room for any personality besides advocating for a homophobic, racist, xenophobic, misogynistic bigot, I still cannot deny my utter disgust for the quality of this app. My phone runs so much slower with it on, and now frequently crashes spontaneously—even when not even using this app. The app itself is very poorly designed and not very user friendly. What’s more, every time I try to use the app I’m accosted by ads for Trump 2020, to the point where I can barely navigate the interface without being accosted. Not your finest hour, Mister Trump—and that’s saying something.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Okay so I am definitely not going to let that Cheeto ban tiktok without a fight. everyone is going to this app and giving it a terrible star rating. Anyways let’s get to my story😝🤪🤪 IT WAS SUPER LAGGY AND THIS OOPMA-LOOMPA WANTED MY PHONE NUMBER!!!! So I was trying to get it off my mind😔😭😳 But the next morning  I WAKE UP TO THIS CHEETO AT MY DOOR. So I opened it and I saw a A BIG OOMPA-LOOPMA CHEETO IN MY FACE. So I kicked🦵 him of my way and I went on my pet Xbox furiously angry so I can get to McDonald’s 🤪🤣🙄🙄 So I get there and I got whopper. But I left McDonald’s then I wanted burger king 👑 to get a McFlurry.😑 when I got it I went home to see this UGLY OOMPA-LOOMPA IN MY ROOM SMELLING MY UNDERWEAR🤔🤔I WAS ANGERY👿👿🤬 so I went downstairs to get a knife 🔪 😈😈 and came upstairs to SCARE HIM. When he saw me he said Mario our the window. 🥳🥳🥳 I WAS SO HAPPY THAT HE LEFT🥳🥳😁😁😁😊 this story was made by me and my cousin. Is it funny or what??

attributes.title: Very Bad 😾😾😾 👁👄👁
attributes.review: I saw this app and it  reminded me of seeing the smallest Cheeto in my life,save Barron he’s cute ❤️ Then I started thinking about Trump which then lead me to thinking ✨ 𝖢 𝗅 𝗈 𝗐 𝗇 𝖵 𝗂 𝖻 𝖾 𝗌✨then Dixie D’Amelio started singing ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆 ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆 ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆 ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆 after that mess my dog Martha was going ruff then she went grrrr for in her~ I got scared and ran away then went and Dixie killed my dog Martha then was singing her new song that was ✨t r a s h✨ on her grave 😿 lololololololol 😹 So in the end of this all DONT download this app or support trump or Dixie will kill your dog,luv ya ❤️ (#justicefortiktok)

So, I 🤠got this app 📱because I 🤠wanted all the latest news 📰 on Daddy Trump 👹and to know 🤔when the next rally is 😸So I 🤠can wear all my fancy 💰new🤩 🇺🇸 TRUMP MERCH!!! 🇺🇸around like minded people 🤗But after I 🌝entered my phone number 📱hesitantly 😥(because technology 🤖is so easy 🍆to hack 🙇into nowadays 😡) I 😼started to notice 😨some weird 🤪stuff happening 😳. This weird 🃏guy 🙋‍♂️in a pink 💖polo👕, white 🌝shorts🩳, and Birkenstock’s 🤮has constantly ⏱been in my 🤗peripheral vision 👁👅👁, doing that “flossing” 🦷dance 🕺that those kids 🤬are always talking 👄about, but every time I 🥴turn he 😾isn’t 🤯there🤬, always just in my periphery 👀... clearly he HACKED 🦾into my phone 📱because I’m 😄a proud 🇺🇸Trump supporter 🇺🇸and wants to make me suffer! 🇺🇸👹DADDY TRUMP, YOU GOTTA HELP ME! MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN AND HELP SOLVE THIS PROBLEM, I CAN’T LAST ANOTHER DAY OF THIS BULL CRAP!!!!!
